Test Name: PHENOSENSE HIV Drug Resistance and Replication Capacity
Purpose: To determine HIV-1 resistance to antiretroviral drugs and assess viral replication capacity.
Container: Polypropylene transport tube (plasma separated from blood collected in EDTA tube)
Equipment: Class II biosafety cabinet, centrifuge, PCR instrument, 96-well tissue culture plates, incubator (37 Â°C, 5% CO2), plate reader
